snippet: Novak Djokovic is on the precipice of history once again at the French Open, reaching the final for the fourth time in five years at the only major tournament he hasn't won....
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic is on the precipice of history once again at the French Open, reaching the final for the fourth time in five years at the only major tournament he hasn't won.

headline.print_headline: No. 1 Djokovic to Face No. 2 Murray in French Open Final
headline.main: No. 1 Djokovic to Face No. 2 Murray in French Open Final
